function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey respondents from multiple countries","Impact":"Potential for cross-border transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Health screening, contact tracing apps, and vaccination programs","People":"Survey respondents and their communities","Owner":"Public health authorities, survey organizers, and governments"},{"Description":"Large percentage of women and men in the survey","Impact":"Risk of gender-specific health issues and disparities in healthcare access","Mitigation":"Promote gender-specific health programs and ensure equal access to healthcare services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, gender-specific health apps, and healthcare accessibility mapping","People":"Women, men, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Health organizations, gender advocacy groups, and healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Households with children under 12 years old","Impact":"Increased risk of child-to-child transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote pediatric vaccination programs and implement child-specific hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Child vaccination reminders, educational apps for children, and hygiene monitoring devices","People":"Children, parents, and caregivers","Owner":"Pediatric healthcare providers, parents, and educational institutions"}]}
